content: crochet your own adorable rat complete with protruding snout floppy ears flexible tail and the sweetest pose you will love creating this little darling for all the rat and mouse lovers in your life and to help celebrate chinese new year this amigurumi rat is part of our chinese new year zodiac amigurumi series that we have been doing every year since 2011 so far we have designed a chinese new year doll dragon snake pony lamb monkey rooster dog pig and rat you can find all the free patterns on my blog we have the ox tiger and rabbit left to design in the coming years 1 https //www etsy com/ca/listing/756536878/chinese-new-year-rat-crochet-pattern
